Breeding adult.description: Long-billed Dowitchers have a front heavy appearance with a rounder belly than Short-billed Dowitchers. The bill is longer than Short-billed Dowitchers, but bill size is not the best field mark to separate dowitchers.

Nonbreeding.description: On foraging birds look for the more hump-backed look of Long-billed Dowitchers compared to the flatter backed Short-billed Dowitchers. The two species, however are very similar; voice is a good way to tell them apart.

Juvenile.description: Long-billed Dowitchers have a more rounded and chunky lower belly compared to Short-billed Dowitchers. On foraging birds, look for the more humped back appearance of Long-billed Dowitchers.
